name: Stellar Escape Lite
description:
Running for your life has never been this visually stunning and smooth before!

• You became the most wanted man in the universe

Enter the high-tech, intergalactic world of Elliot Black, a space courier from the Beta Sector. After a courier job goes wrong and you accidentally foiled Lord Gulasch’s destructive plans, you’re forced to flee for your life. You have to survive by escaping his henchmen and dodging obstacles that you will meet along the way leading back to your spaceship.

• Stunning effects and smooth controls

Brace yourself for an extreme adrenaline rush as you try to escape Lord Gulasch's space center. Enjoy the awesome graphics and super-smooth, accurate controls. Experience the ultra-high speed chase.

• Lite version now available!

You can play up to Level 4 in the Lite Version. Don't forget to purchase the Full version to enjoy all the 15 challenging and exciting levels set in 5 different areas of the space facility. You can also play the Endless Mode to quench your thirst for more futuristic adventures! Relive Eliot's nightmare escape over and over in the Full version! Get the Full version to also disable distracting ad banners in the game! Are you up for the challenge? Play Stellar Escape now!

Features
• High-tech, space-age themed 3D graphics
• Highly responsive and sensitive controls
• Lots of different lethal obstacles along the way
• The Lite version offers 4 action-packed levels to enjoy
• Interesting and epic storyline
